byline.contributor: Dakota Lane contributed reporting from Forestburgh, N.Y.

abstract: Vows column on wedding of Cooper Boone and Mark Veeder.
lead_paragraph: Cooper Boone, who had little interest in a partner, began falling in love with Mark Veeder at a country fair. Now they’re married with children.

headline.main: Two Men Gone Country and Their Dreamgirls
headline.print_headline: Two Men Gone Country and Their Dreamgirls

snippet: Cooper Boone, who had little interest in a partner, began falling in love with Mark Veeder at a country fair. Now they’re married with children....
